about.title: About Me
paragraphs: Hello! I'm Awadh Kishor Singh, a passionate Full Stack Developer based in Bengaluru. I enjoy creating things that live on the internet, whether that be websites, applications, or anything in between.
My goal is to always build products that provide pixel-perfect, performant experiences. I am a quick learner and always eager to take on new challenges.
